title: Marrying The Billionaire Single Dad (Big Bad Billionaires, # 4)
description: BILLIONAIRE BOSS. ACCIDENTAL WIFE. SINGLE DAD. ONE BED...I made one mistake.I fell for my boss.It started with one reckless encounter at a party.The next morning?I walked into my new job—only to find out my boss is the billionaire rockstar I met last night.I try to quit.He makes me a different offer instead.A marriage of convenience.One year. No feelings.And a paycheck that could change my life.It’s supposed to be business.And suddenly, I’m not just falling for my fake husband.I’m falling for the family we were never supposed to be.The twist I never saw coming?He might actually be falling for me, too.
author: L. Steele
